title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: 4C/ID Model-Based Teacher Professional Development (TPD) and

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of AfL (evidence collection, analysis, interpretation, and classroom application) in the context of actual classroom situations.
Learners can design AfL strategies using the four components of the 4C/ID model (learning tasks, supportive information, procedural information, part-task practice).
Learners can revise and improve their AfL implementation plans based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
